 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure

Interface Summary
Bandwidth A Bandwidth represents a network link between two adjacent GridSites.
ComputingElement This interface defined the functionality of a ComputingElement (CE), which processes GridJobs.
StorageElement The StorageElement (SE) is where DataFiles in the Grid are stored.
 

Class Summary
BackgroundBandwidth BackgroundBandwidth extends SimpleBandwidth by adding background (non-Grid) traffic to the network as described in the userguide.
BandwidthData This class holds the mean and standard deviation from the mean of a bandwidth.
BandwidthFactory The Bandwidth factory is used to get Bandwidth instances, either SimpleBandwidth or BackgroundBandwidth depending on the simulation parameters.
BandwidthReader This class provides a method to read the average available bandwidth for the appropriate time of day from a file, for use in OptorSim as a "realistic" input bandwidth.
BinaryTree This class implements a binary tree.
DataFile Class DataFile is used to create file objects which contain information on the filename, size, pinning status, master status and creation time of the files.
FileTransfer FileTransfer takes care of file transfers over the simulated Grid.
FileTransferFactory The FileTransferFactory handles all the FileTransfers.
GridContainer This class keeps track of GridSites and the replicate and copy methods are used to transfer files from one site to another.
GridJob A class which defines a job as a vector of DataFiles.
GridSite A GridSite keeps track of the CEs and SEs on a site.
GridSitePair Class that implements an unordered pair of grid sites.
JobConfFileReader This class provides a method to read the contents of the job configuration file and other methods to access the retrieved information.
MathSupport This class provides computational support for arithmetic calculations in OptorSim.
NodeCounter this class implements a counter for the elements of a binary tree
OptorSimParameters This class holds information on the various parameters that can be varied in the simulation.
SimpleBandwidth SimpleBandwidth represents a network link whose capacity never changes and which only carries Grid traffic.
Statistics Keeps all the output data from the simulation in the one place, so it can all be printed out with one method call.
